original_title: Back to the Garden, Flower Power Comes Full Circle
overview: In 1988, filmmaker Kevin Tomlinson filmed & interviewed a group of back-to-the- land "hippies"--living off-grid, insulated from mainstream culture. In 2006 he tracked down his subjects again to find out what had become of their families' utopian plans and dreams.
tagline: Could Hippies become the new role model for surviving an economic meltdown?
title: Back to the Garden, Flower Power Comes Full Circle
